resources.string:
The Metaio SDK includes a QR and Barcode reader. 
Scan example QR Code or generate it yourself to load website, video and more. 

If you want to test the Image Recognition please select 'eye' icon from menu on the right.

The Metaio SDK provide reliable tracking technology for 2-D images, 3-D objects and environments, SLAM instant tracking, location-based tracking and more. Demo is using 2D images recognition only. \n\nIf you want to test the QR/Barcode scanner select icon from menu on the right.
Unable to save the image. Please make sure that SD card is available on the phone and the phone is not connected to the USB cable.
